item.title: What's the goal of this website?
item.description: The main goal is to write about things that I enjoy such as programming, photographs that I’ve taken and places where I traveled, and last but not least, quotes from books that I read and that were meaningful to me. Programming I want to explain a few things that I understood but never took time to explain. This is inspired by the Feynman technique: Choose the concepts that you want to learn Pretend you are teaching to somebody with the understanding level of a 6-grade student Identify gaps in your knowledge and go to step 1.
